wikipedia_page.main: Wayne Cooney (born 23 March 1968) is a former footballer who played in the League of Ireland during the 1990s.

response: McEvoy played for the Republic of Ireland national football team youth team against Iceland in the qualifiers for the 1986 UEFA European Under-18 Football Championship in November 1985. Future Rovers teammate Wayne Cooney scored in this 2–0 win.
*Wayne Cooney, former association football player who played in the League of Ireland during the 1990s
